description:
Nicknamed "Roy", Robert DeVice is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch25724 [mobile police squad "Thunderbolt"] in Tokyo, and police instructor of http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur].
He and Katsumi become lovers over time; Roy`s death is the trigger of Katsumi`s biggest emotional crisis.
name: Robert DeVice
